about_the_game:
You're a pilot on the Persephone, humanity's last colony ship sent into the inky black before a gamma ray burst sterilized Earth.

Explore a unique, procedurally generated galaxy filled with alien artifacts and resources to extract and exploit. Try to eke enough matter from the cosmos to keep the guttering candle of humanity alight for one last jaunt into the dark.

Play with your friends with local co-op, or use Steam Remote Play together to mine asteroids, harvest nebulae, and harness the cosmos to support the Persephone and her precious cargo of cryogenic humanity as you search for a new home

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or higher
  • Processor: Intel i5 @ 3.0 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 550 or equivalent
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.11 (El Capitan)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000 or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
